description: Maps API endpoints to their registered owners /n/n[API Owners](https://cloud.samsara.com/internal/api-ownership)

schema.name: gql_key
schema.description: The GraphQL identifier associated with the api endpoint. Represented as '<method>_<route>_<version>' (e.g., 'GET_addresses_2018.01.01')

schema.name: team
schema.description: The team name registered as the endpoint's owner

schema.name: method
schema.description: The http method name of the api endpoint - (e.g., 'GET', 'POST', 'DELETE')

schema.name: route
schema.description: The path of the api endpoint

schema.name: version
schema.description: The version of the api endpoint. Represented as the release date in 'YYY.mm.dd' format/n/n (e.g., '2018.01.01', '2021.02.16')

schema.name: slo_group_name
schema.description: Service Level Objective (SLO) group id /n/n[SLO Groupings](https://paper.dropbox.com/doc/SLO-Platform-Configuration--BTe57wFfJuhZN9xaHuGgaaJ0Ag-9hcG4vpTbAlVuSzTmOsnE#:uid=240644017203544467293836&h2=SLO-Groupings)/n/n[SLO Policy](https://paper.dropbox.com/doc/SLO-Policy--BTfgn3BRW0UpEF0mLNrBrhJ4Ag-nWQqLIwzeaqAc26uGl1MR)/n/n[SLOs at Samsara](https://paper.dropbox.com/doc/SLOs-at-Samsara--BTdmmQfzBBXFsTEJ9qah4y3IAg-kRMwhxmVHkPJ1rzFm04Fp)

schema.name: rate_limit_per_sec
schema.description: The default number of requests that the api endpoint will accept per second. (-1) indicates no limit

schema.name: rate_limit_per_min
schema.description: The default number of requests that the api endpoint will accept per minute. (-1) indicates no limit

schema.name: rate_limit_per_hour
schema.description: The default number of requests that the api endpoint will accept per hour. (-1) indicates no limit

schema.name: rate_limit_per_day
schema.description: The default number of requests that the api endpoint will accept per day. (-1) indicates no limit

schema.name: rate_limit_burst
schema.description: The number of requests to the api endpoint exceeding the rate limit per second that will be accepted and queued before being rejected

schema.name: rate_limit_not_enforced
schema.description: A boolean flag indicating whether the api endpoint's set rate limit is ignored

schema.name: rate_limit_not_enabled
schema.description: A boolean flag indicating whether the api endpoint's set rate limit is disabled

schema.name: visibility
schema.description: An ENUM indicating the api endpoint's type of visibility -- (e.g., 'Internal', 'Public')

schema.name: release_state
schema.description: An ENUM indicating the api endpoint's release state -- (e.g., 'Preview', 'Beta', 'Stable') /n/n[API-Release-Process](https://samsara.atlassian-us-gov-mod.net/wiki/spaces/RD/pages/5643182/API+Release+Process+84c5)
